name: omgpokemans
text: Not to look a gift horse in the mouth, but I really wish Sony would give Vita users the same kind of value from PS+ as the PS3/4 gets. PS3 gets Borderlands 2, Vita gets Star Wars Pinball. PS3 gets BioShock Infinite, Vita gets Worms. Just saying a AAA title couldn't hurt your Vita sales Sony.
